paswaru 01.15-02.30 dharma sakachchawa siri wajirarama daham pasal pradhana aacharya gaurawa shasthrawedi migoda sukhitha himi 03.00-04.00 bhawanawa saha anushasanawa – siri wajiraramawasi pitipana sasanarathana himi, 04.00-05.00 gihi deshanawa – shasthrapathi rajakiya panditha kirama rahula himi , 06.00- 06.30 atawisi buddha wandanawa ha sil aluth kirima – siri wajiraramawasi swamin wahansela poda perawaru 6.00 – 7.00 sila samadanaya saha anushasanaya aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 7.00-7.30 theruwan wandanawa , 8.15-10.00 bhawanawa aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi 10.00-11.00 dharma deshanawa aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 11.00-11.30 theruwan wandanawa paswaru 1.00-2.00 dharma deshanawa dorowwe nyanarathana himi, 2.00-3.00 dharma sakachchawa ,4.00-5.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi uninduwela sumanasara himi, 5.00-6.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi aluthwela dhammasathi himi, 7.00 atawisi buddha wandanawa moratuwa, katubadda, thelawala, wijayaruparama dharmayathanadhipathi, kolambaa dishawe pradhana sanghanayaka ‘shasana kirthi shi්ra’ rajakiya panditha shasthrawedi dampahala nyanarathana nahimiyange anushasakathwayen purapoho dina wadasatahana pawathwe.
